content.json:
# Intune change tracking
Intune change tracking Workbook **V1** by [Niklas Tinner](https://twitter.com/NiklasTinner). *(last update: 14.10.2022)*
* View the [full implementation guide](https://oceanleaf.ch/intune-change-tracking/).
* Make sure that Intune diagnostics data > Audit logs are sent to the selected Log Analytics Workspace.
* Powered by [Oceanleaf.ch](https://oceanleaf.ch/)

parameters.name: timerange
parameters.label: Time range
parameters.description: Choose a custom time range for the queries.

content.json: Please choose a custom profile type to customize log queries:

parameters.name: Profiletype
parameters.label: Profile type
parameters.description: Choose a custom profile type to customize log queries.
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"Configuration", "label":"Device configuration profiles"},
    { "value":"App", "label":"Apps" },
    { "value":"Update", "label":"Update profiles"},
    { "value":"Compliance", "label":"Compliance policies"},
    { "value":"Deployment", "label":"Deployment profiles"},
    { "value":"DeviceManagementScript", "label":"Scripts"},
    { "value":"DeviceHealthSCript", "label":"Proactive remediation"},
    { "value":"Certificate", "label":"Certificate profile"}
]

content.json:
## Profile type Audit events
Table output of custom profile type audit events.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "{Profiletype}"
| extend Name = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).TargetDisplayNames))[0])
| project TimeGenerated, Name, OperationName, Identity, CorrelationId, ResultType
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 50

content.json:
## Search the Audit event by Correlation ID
Copy the correlationID from the query above to explore the event.

parameters.name: correlationid
parameters.label: Search Correlation ID
parameters.description: Unique Correlation ID of an Audit event.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where CorrelationId == "{correlationid}"
| extend ProfileName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).TargetDisplayNames))[0])
| extend Targets = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).Targets))[0])
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, ProfileName, Targets, OperationName, ResultType, Identity, Properties, CorrelationId

content.json:
### Value changes
Find the changed Settings Name and compare old with the new values.
These are only the first 10 changes (0-9) from the profile. For more information run the query from "Search the Audit Event"

content.query:
//Define the current change number (entry)
let changenumber = 0;
IntuneAuditLogs
| where CorrelationId == "{correlationid}"
| extend Name_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).Targets))[0].ModifiedProperties))[changenumber].Name)
| extend Old_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).Targets))[0].ModifiedProperties))[changenumber].Old)
| extend New_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).Targets))[0].ModifiedProperties))[changenumber].New)
| project Name_, Old_, New_
content.title: Change 0

content.query:
//Define the current change number (entry)
let changenumber = 1;
IntuneAuditLogs
| where CorrelationId == "{correlationid}"
| extend Name_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).Targets))[0].ModifiedProperties))[changenumber].Name)
| extend Old_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).Targets))[0].ModifiedProperties))[changenumber].Old)
| extend New_ = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).Targets))[0].ModifiedProperties))[changenumber].New)
| project Name_, Old_, New_

content.json:
## Changes over time
This is a visualization of custom profile type changes, summarized per day.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "{Profiletype}"
| summarize Changes=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)

content.json:
## Top 10 modified profiles
Find the top modified profiles by profile type.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "{Profiletype}"
| extend ProfileName = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).TargetDisplayNames))[0])
| summarize count() by ProfileName
| top 10 by ProfileName desc

content.json:
## Search events for profiles by a specific term
Please specify a term/name in the parameter below to search the Profile Names.

parameters.name: Termsearch
parameters.label: Search a term/name
parameters.description: Please specify a term to search the profiles.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName contains "{Profiletype}"
| extend Name = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).TargetDisplayNames))[0])
| where Name contains "{Termsearch}"
| project TimeGenerated, Name, OperationName, Identity, CorrelationId, ResultType
| take 25

content.json:
## Intune Audit event types
An overview count of different Intune subjects, filtered by custom time range.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName contains "Configuration")
| extend Title = "Device Configuration Profiles"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName contains "App")
| extend Title = "Apps"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName contains "Update")
| extend Title = "Update profiles"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName contains "Compliance")
| extend Title = "Compliance profiles"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize App=countif(OperationName contains "Deployment")
| extend Title = "Deployment profiles"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName contains "DeviceManagementScript")
| extend Title = "Scripts"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName contains "DeviceHealthScript")
| extend Title = "Proactive remediation script packages"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName !contains "Configuration" and OperationName !contains "App" and OperationName !contains "Update" and OperationName !contains "Compliance" and OperationName !contains "DeviceManagementScript" and OperationName !contains "DeviceHealthScript")
| extend Title = "Other"

items.name: query - 1 - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy - Copy

content.json:
## Intune method
An overview of the most common Audit event methods, filtered by custom time range.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize countif(OperationName startswith "Create")
| extend Title = "Create"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize countif(OperationName startswith "Delete")
| extend Title = "Delete"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize countif(OperationName startswith "Patch")
| extend Title = "Patch"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize countif(OperationName startswith "Assign")
| extend Title = "Assign"

IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName startswith "{Intunemethod}"
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, ResultType, Identity, CorrelationId, Properties
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 10

content.json:
## Recent Audit events
A table of all Audit events, based on the selected time range.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, ResultType, Identity, CorrelationId, Properties
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 25

content.json:
## Intune Audit event count
A count of Audit events over a fixed time range.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize count()
content.title: 24 hours

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize count()
content.title: 48 hours

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize count()
content.title: 7 days

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize count()
content.title: 30 days

content.json:
## Device to tenant assignment 
View stats for Autopilot device identity/hardware hash assignment to your tenant.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName startswith "CreateImportedWindowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity")
| extend Title = "Upload hardware hash"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName startswith "UpdateDeviceProperties")
| extend Title = "Update device identity"

IntuneAuditLogs
| summarize allcount = countif(OperationName startswith "DeleteWindowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity")
| extend Title = "Delete device identity"

content.json:
## Find Device Identity events
Search Device Identity events by action.

parameters.name: Action
parameters.description: Please choose a device identity action.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName startswith "{Action}"
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, Identity, Properties, CorrelationId, ResultType
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| take 25

content.json:
## Authenticated Identities
Pie chart about the used identities to register a hardware hash.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName startswith "CreateImportedWindowsAutopilotDeviceIdentity"
| summarize count() by Identity

content.json:
## Search Device operations
Find event logs for specified device actions.

parameters.name: Operation
parameters.jsonData:
[
    { "value":"CreateDeviceLogCollectionRequest ManagedDevice", "label":"Log collection request"},
    { "value":"CreateDownloadUrl ManagedDevice", "label":"Download URL" },
    { "value":"Delete ManagedDevice", "label":"Delete"},
    { "value":"syncDevice ManagedDevice", "label":"Sync" },
    { "value":"wipe ManagedDevice", "label":"Wipe" },
    { "value":"UpdateDevicePrimaryUsers ManagedDevice", "label":"Update primary user" },
    { "value":"cleanWindowsDevice ManagedDevice", "label":"Clean (Fresh start/Autopilot reset)" },
    { "value":"rebootNow ManagedDevice", "label":"Reboot" },
    { "value":"windowsDefenderScan ManagedDevice", "label":"Defender Scan (quick/full)" },
    { "value":"windowsDefenderUpdateSignatures ManagedDevice", "label":"Update Defender signature" },
    { "value":"retire ManagedDevice", "label":"Retire" },
    { "value":"Rename device ManagedDevice", "label":"Rename" },
    { "value":"locateDevice ManagedDevice", "label":"Locate" }
]

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| where OperationName == "{Operation}"
| extend IntuneDeviceID = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).TargetObjectIds))[0])
| order by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, IntuneDeviceID, Identity, Properties

content.json:
## Search event logs for a specific device
Specify the Intune Device ID to find all Audit event logs.

parameters.name: DeviceID
parameters.label: Intune Device ID
parameters.description: Please specify an Intune Device ID. (found under the Intune device object.

content.query:
IntuneAuditLogs
| extend IntuneDeviceID = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(Properties).TargetObjectIds))[0])
| where IntuneDeviceID == "{DeviceID}"
| project TimeGenerated, OperationName, Identity, ResultType, CorrelationId, Properties, IntuneDeviceID
| order by TimeGenerated desc
